Class Marketplace

  • java.lang.Object
    • Marketplace

  • public class Marketplace
extends java.lang.Object
    This class simulates an online marketplace where people can buy and sell items. The marketplace maintains the information on all the registered buyers and sellers, the items available for sale, and the orders made by buyers.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Marketplace()
      Constructs a Marketplace.

      • searchItemsByID

        public Item searchItemsByID(int id)
        Returns the item that has the given item id. If no item is found that has the given id, then null is returned.
        Parameters:
        id - an item id
        Returns:
        the item containing the supplied item id, or null if no item is found with that id
